meanings.definition: A type of tree native to South America.
meanings.sent1: The quebrachos in the forest provide shade and shelter for many animals.
meanings.sent2: The quebrachos are known for their strong and durable wood.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel built its nest high up in the quebrachos tree.
meanings.sent4: The quebrachos stood tall like ancient guardians of the jungle.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green leaves of the quebrachos danced in the wind.

meanings.definition: The wood of this tree, used for various purposes.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter crafted a beautiful table from quebrachos.
meanings.sent2: The quebrachos wood is prized for its strength and rich color.
meanings.sent3: The children built a fort out of quebrachos logs in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of quebrachos filled the workshop, reminding him of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The intricate patterns in the quebrachos grain mesmerized all who saw it.
